input.sentences: the family took a vacation by the ocean .
they came to some old buildings by the water .
the baby was curious about what was around him .
then they all sat down to eat .
after that they went on a boat out in the ocean .
output.sentences: It was baby jens first vacation.
The family hadn't been on vacation since she had been born and were very excited.
Jen did very well in the car on the way there.
She loved trying new food at the restaurants they went to.
Her favorite part was her first boat ride.
